description: Attackers can use print.exe for remote file copy Author: Furkan CALISKAN, @caliskanfurkan_, @oscd_initiative. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Abusing Print Executable
query: ((process.executable:*\\print.exe AND process.command_line:print* AND process.command_line:*\/D* AND process.command_line:*.exe*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*print.exe*)))
